title: Veggie Magazine - November 2018 (gnv64)
description: Veggie Magazine - November 2018 English | 116 pages | PDF | 35.7 mb EAT WELL 6 THE SCOOP - Food news from the veggie community and plenty of updates from our readers. 9 APPLE TASTIC - Tuck in to these indulgent desserts — from a caramel-drizzled galette, to a spiced apple strudel. 13 WORLD VEGAN MONTH - Celebrate in style with these hearty plant-based dishes, bursting with flavour. 21 SADIE FROST - Our columnist talks all things protein, gut health and being kind to yourself. 22 COCOA POWER - Editorial assistant, Ellie, puts veggie and vegan chocolates to the test. 24 ROAST WITH THE MOST - Lucy Watson’s delicious vegan roast is a guaranteed hit for your Christmas dinner table. 30 SOUPER HEROES - This winter staple is endlessly flexible and packed with goodness. 34 7 WAYS WITH ROOT VEG - Move over summer salads – it’s the potato, carrot and beets’ time to shine! 37 ONE PAN WONDER - Serve up these festive tray bakes to wow your guests this Christmas. 41 GOOD MOOD FOOD - Tasty recipes to help you tackle Seasonal Affective Disorder. 45 SPICE THINGS UP - There’s nothing quite like a veggie curry to satisfy on chilly evenings. 55 A LITTLE SEASONING - Choice condiments to give your favourite comfort food a kick. 57 CHRISTMAS COCKTAILS - Creamy coffee-flavoured beverages to throw the ultimate seasonal soirée. 61 ÁINE CARLIN - Watch your waste this Christmas with Áine’s handy homemade gift ideas. 62 STOCK YOUR CUPBOARDS - Prepare for the cold snap with our selection of Vegetarian Society-approved foods. SHOP WELL 68 WRAP-UP FASHION - Update your autumn wardrobe with editor Holly’s top ethical fashion picks. 71 KATE ARNELL - This month, Kate investigates planet-friendly brands ahead of the festive season. 73 TRIED & TESTED - Sian Bunney gives her seal of approval to some cruelty-free hand creams. 74 NIGHT-TIME RITUAL - Follow these easy steps and you’ll wake up to flawless skin! 77 GORGEOUS GIFTS - Get a head-start on your Christmas shopping with these lovely stocking fillers. 83 MODERN TWIST - Who says advent calendars have to be all about chocolate? 85 NATURAL BEAUTY - Make your own lip balms, bath bombs and body lotions using fresh, fragrant ingredients. 88 PLANT PRIDE - The best vegan food, fashion and beauty products to buy now. LIVE WELL 93 HEALTH BITES - All the latest nutrition and wellbeing advice this month. 97 THE TRUTH IS OUT - Are vegetarians and vegans actually healthier than meat eaters? Read on and find out… 99 COLD BUSTERS - Keep the sniffles at bay with these immune-boosting recipes. 103 LIQUID GOLD - Silky coconut cream and smooth hazelnut spread make this vegan hot choc the ultimate indulgence. 104 PROTECT THE PLANET - Here are the simple things you can do now to reduce plastic waste. https://i.postimg.cc/sgcSJPxj/Veggie-Magazine-November-2018.jpg
